description: Fix TX Medicaid for Children validation expectations - update benefit values and eligibility (MFB-638)

updates.reason: $4,137 annual value represents estimated health insurance coverage cost for one eligible infant
$4,137 annual value represents estimated health insurance coverage cost for one eligible child
$12,412 annual value represents estimated health insurance coverage cost for 3 eligible children (infant, preschooler, teen)
$4,137 annual value represents estimated health insurance coverage cost for one eligible child in SSI household
Household income exceeds 138% FPL limit for ages 6-18
